mapper.select: select * from tblbackstage where adminId=#{adminId} and adminPwd=#{adminPwd}

select * from( select z.*,rownum rn from( select * from TblForeground
company like concat(concat('%',#{userBean.company}),'%') and address like concat(concat('%',#{userBean.address}),'%') and contacts like concat(concat('%',#{userBean.contacts}),'%') and busNum=#{userBean.busNum} and logicId =6
order by company)z where rownum < =#{pages}*10 )r where r.rn > =(#{pages}-1)*10+1
mapper.update: update tblforeground set stateId=#{stateId} where companyId=#{companyId}
update tblforeground set logicId=7 where companyId=#{companyId}
update tblbackstage set adminPwd=#{adminPwd} where adminId=#{adminId}
mapper.select: select a.ITEMID,b.* from tblitemcom a,tblterm b where a.ITEMID = #{itemId} and a.TERMID = b.TERMID
